mapper.sql: SELECT TM.ID AS TEST_METRIC_ID, TM.OPERATION AS TEST_METRIC_OPERATION, TM.ELAPSED AS TEST_METRIC_ELAPSED, TM.TEST_ID AS TEST_METRIC_TEST_ID, TM.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_METRIC_MODIFIED_AT, TM.CREATED_AT AS TEST_METRIC_CREATED_AT FROM TEST_METRICS TM
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(TR.ENV) FROM TEST_RUNS TR INNER JOIN TESTS T ON T.TEST_RUN_ID = TR.ID INNER JOIN TEST_METRICS TM ON T.TEST_RUN_ID = TR.ID WHERE T.TEST_CASE_ID = #{testCaseId};

SELECT TM.ID AS TEST_METRIC_ID, TM.OPERATION AS TEST_METRIC_OPERATION, TM.ELAPSED AS TEST_METRIC_ELAPSED, TM.TEST_ID AS TEST_METRIC_TEST_ID, TM.MODIFIED_AT AS TEST_METRIC_MODIFIED_AT, TM.CREATED_AT AS TEST_METRIC_CREATED_AT FROM TEST_METRICS TM INNER JOIN TESTS T ON TM.TEST_ID = T.ID INNER JOIN TEST_RUNS TR ON T.TEST_RUN_ID = TR.ID WHERE T.TEST_CASE_ID = #{testCaseId} AND TR.ENV = #{env};
